title: The offer and order giuen forth by Sir Thomas Smyth, Knight, and Thomas Smyth his sonne vnto suche as be willing to accompanye the sayde Thomas Smyth the sonne, in his voyage for the inhabiting some partes of the northe of Irelande.
author: Smyth, Thomas, Sir.
notes: Place of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Second paragraph ends "The first payment to begin four yeares hence, videlicet, 1576."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
